name: Build & Upgrade
description:
Another boring RTS game made by SLT World himself.

Connect islands together using bridges to get wood from the other side!
Build farms to get food!

House - 15 Wood
Farm House - 15 Wood
Farm - 15 Wood
Bridge - 25 Wood
Tower - 35 Wood

Added (Saving System)

 - To reset/delete the saved progress, go to the "C:\Users\{DefaultUser}\AppData\LocalLow\SLT World\Build _ Upgrade", and delete the (.save) files.

Source Code: https://github.com/SLT-World/Build-and-Upgrade
